name: Aqua Pet
description:
Hello and welcome to Aqua Pet! A fish simulation game in which you can buy fish and care for them. Feed them and keep poisonous food away from them. Remove any dead fish so that your other fish do not eat it. You can also purchase decorations and place them wherever you want, as well as lighting for your fish and a background for your aquarium. You can buy more fish if you upgrade your aquarium.

FEATURE

- When you go offline, the fish continue to grow and give coins through the offline chest.

- Decoration Z order change  base on where you put it.

Liluo.io link: https://liluo.io/makeplay/aqua-pet
